Game Text:	To play, exert 2 Dwarves. When you play this, add a [Dwarven] token here for each mountain site and each underground site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a Shadow player discard the top card of his or her draw deck.
